data.comment: The match is underway at Yurtec Stadium.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 5, Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot on goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Kobe at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai's Takuma Hamasaki gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Sendai in the half of Kobe.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 11, Kobe drives forward and Noriaki Fujimoto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Important block from the Sendai defence as Dyanfrez Douglas fires in a strike for Kobe.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 13, Dyanfrez Douglas for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Sendai Kobe attack through Noriaki Fujimoto. The finish is off target, however.
Sendai have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Sendai.
In the minute 21, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Sendai's Para breaks free at Yurtec Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Kobe at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 23, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Hotaru Yamaguchi for Kobe gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kobe throw-in in Sendai's half.
Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Kobe throw-in in Sendai's half.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Kobe's Dyanfrez Douglas breaks free at Yurtec Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Sendai.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Throw-in for Kobe at Yurtec Stadium.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Sendai.
Goal! Kyogo Furuhashi gives Kobe a 0-1 lead in Sendai.
That's a fine assist from Gotoku Sakai.
In the minute 49, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Kobe's area.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 51, Kobe move into a 0-2 lead through a Yuta Goke header.
Great play from Kyogo Furuhashi to set up the goal.
Shun Nagasawa strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-2 at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 53, Kunimitsu Sekiguchi instrumental with a fine assist.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 55, Dyanfrez Douglas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kobe.
In Sendai Kobe drive forward through Dyanfrez Douglas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 56, Kobe's Hotaru Yamaguchi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Sendai a goal kick.
Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kobe.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
The home team have replaced Hiroto Yamada with Alexandre Guedes. This is the first substitution made today by Takashi Kiyama.
Takayoshi Ishihara is replacing Isaac Cuenca for the home team.
In the minute 59, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Sendai push upfield and Takayoshi Ishihara gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kobe defence.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 66, Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Kobe, close to Sendai's area.
Kobe make their first substitution with Junya Tanaka replacing Noriaki Fujimoto.
Daiju Sasaki is on a sub for Yuta Goke for Kobe.
In the minute 68, Kobe have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Kobe's Junya Tanaka fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 69, Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Sendai.
In the minute 69, Can Kobe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
The home team replace Kunimitsu Sekiguchi with Takumi Sasaki.
Shogo Nakahara is replacing Takuma Hamasaki for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 73, Kobe pushes forward through Daiju Sasaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Kobe.
At Yurtec Stadium, Kobe are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 75, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Goal! Ryutaro Iio (Sendai) levels the score at 2-2 with a header in Sendai.
Takumi Sasaki with an assist there.
In the minute 77, Dyanfrez Douglas heads in to make it 2-3 at Yurtec Stadium.
Daigo Nishi with an assist there.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 82, Atsuhiro Miura is making the team's third substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Takuya Yasui replacing Sergi Samper.
Sendai push upfield but Koichiro Fukushima quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Sendai make their fifth substitution with Wataru Tanaka replacing Keiya Shiihashi.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Kobe.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 86, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Kobe.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 89, Sendai have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Sendai throw-in in Kobe's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe have a goal kick.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
That's full-time at Yurtec Stadium. The final score is 2-3.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sendai to check on Kyogo Furuhashi, who is grimacing with pain.
Atsuhiro Miura (Kobe) is making a fourth substitution, with Keijiro Ogawa replacing Kyogo Furuhashi.
Hiroki Iikura (Kobe) has received a yellow card from Koichiro Fukushima.
